jaxfluids.stencils.levelset.deriv_first_order module

class jaxfluids.stencils.levelset.deriv_first_order.DerivativeFirstOrderSided(nh: int, inactive_axis: List, offset: int = 0)[source]

Bases: jaxfluids.stencils.spatial_derivative.SpatialDerivative

derivative_xi(levelset: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, dxi: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, i: int, j: int, *args) → jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase[source]

Calculates the derivative in the direction indicated by axis.

Parameters

  • buffer (jax.Array) – Buffer for which the derivative will be calculated

  • dxi (jax.Array) – Cell sizes along axis direction

  • axis (int) – Spatial axis along which derivative is calculated

Returns

Buffer with numerical derivative

Return type

jax.Array
